title: Bike check: The Factor Ostro VAM of Israel–Premier Tech in the 2023 Tour de France
content:
This Factor aero bike features parts from FSA, Black Inc, and a blacked-out tire that definitely isn't sponsor correct.

Read the full article at Bike check: The Factor Ostro VAM of Israel–Premier Tech in the 2023 Tour de France on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
